languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, систему патрулируют корабли темных эльдаров. Вероятность проскользнуть мимо их патрулей... крайне невелика".

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан, систему патрулируют корабли темных эльдар. Вероятность проскользнуть мимо их патрулей... крайне невелика

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, систему патрулируют корабли темных эльдаров. Вероятность проскользнуть мимо их патрулей... крайне невелика".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."
"Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."
"Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."
"Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."

languages.text: “舰长大人，黑暗灵族的战舰正在这个星系中巡逻。若想在不被发现的情况下绕过他们的巡逻……可能性接近于零。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，黑暗灵族的战舰正在这个星系中巡逻。若想在不被发现的情况下绕过他们的巡逻……可能性接近于零。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hay naves Drukhari patrullando el sistema. Las probabilidades de pasar desapercibidos son... prácticamente cero».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hay naves Drukhari patrullando el sistema. Las probabilidades de pasar desapercibidos son... prácticamente cero».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Schiffe der Drukhari patrouillieren das System. Die Chance, unerkannt an ihnen vorbeizukommen, ist ... gleich Null."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Schiffe der Drukhari patrouillieren das System. Die Chance, unerkannt an ihnen vorbeizukommen, ist ... gleich Null."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, des vaisseaux drukharis patrouillent dans le système. Nos chances de passer entre les mailles du filet sans nous faire remarquer sont... proches de zéro. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, des vaisseaux drukharis patrouillent dans le système. Nos chances de passer entre les mailles du filet sans nous faire remarquer sont... proches de zéro. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、デュカーリの船が星系を巡回しています。気付かれずに回避できる確率は…ほぼゼロです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、デュカーリの船が星系を巡回しています。気付かれずに回避できる確率は…ほぼゼロです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Drukhari gemileri sistemde devriye geziyor. Fark edilmeden devriyelerin arasından geçme ihtimalimiz... Sıfıra yakın."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, Drukhari ships are patrolling the system. The likelihood of slipping past their patrols unnoticed is... close to zero."
